name: Redgear Cosmo 7,1 Usb Gaming Wired Over Ear Headphones With Mic With Virtual Surround Sound,50Mm Driver, Rgb Leds & Remote Control
description:
Sound Quality: Truly immerse yourself in your games with hardware-driven virtual 7.1 surround sound for precisely located audio. Inline Remote :Yes.

Microphone: Redgear Cosmo 7.1 comes equipped with a high quality built-in noise cancelling microphone for a quick and stable communication.

Build Quality: It’s luxurious noise-isolating memory foam ear pads and adjustable split headband which reduces pressure and provides optimal comfort for long gaming sessions.

Noise Cancellation: Redgear Cosmo 7.1 provides you a passive noise cancelling experience. It’s closed earcups design blocks any kind of distraction from outside which helps you keep focus during the game for as long as you want.

Other Features: This headset has an amazing RGB LED light effect on ear-ups and tip of the microphone. It also comes equipped with audio control which helps control volume.

name: Cosmic Byte H11 Gaming Wired Over-ear Headset with Microphone
description:
Driver size: 40mm, impedance: 32 ohms
Suitable for PC, laptops, mobiles, PS4, Xbox One
Single 3.5 mm audio mic jack
Volume rocker
1 year warranty for manufacturing defects

name: Cosmic Byte Equinox Kronos Wireless 5.8Ghz Gaming Headset, Dolby Atmos, Extreme Low Latency 20ms
description:
Experience Wireless Immersive sound with Dolby Atmos.

Wireless Connectivity with 5.8Ghz band. Making it the lowest latency wireless gaming headset with Dolby Atmos.

High Fidelity 50mm Dynamic Driver enables you to experience sound as it should be. Accurate placement, good bass and crisp clarity for an amazing immersive experience.

Uni-directional Pullout ENC Detachable Microphone for excellent recording and streaming quality. Don't waste time reducing background noise in your room, just turn on the ENC function and start gaming!!

Compatible with PC, PS4, PS5, Mobiles, Tablets, Xbox. Dolby Atmos with work only on Windows PC. 7.1 surround will work with other devices using USB.

name: Redgear Cloak Wired RGB Wired Over Ear Gaming Headphones with Mic for PC
description:
Sound Quality: Redgear Cloak comes equipped with 50mm Driver with Enhanced audio bass and clarity which dramatically improves your in-game sound experience. Inline Remote : No.

Microphone: It comes equipped with a Omni-directional microphone which can be used as per you gaming situations. You can just put it up if it is not in use.

Build Quality: It’s luxurious noise-isolating memory foam ear pads and adjustable split headband reduces pressure and provides optimal comfort for long gaming sessions.

Other Features: This headset has an amazing RGB LED light effect on ear-ups and tip of the microphone. It also comes equipped with volume control, so just scroll up or down to adjust it.

name: EKSA E900Pro Gaming Wired Over Ear Headphones with Virtual 7.1 Surround Sound, Noise Cancelling with Mic & Led
description:
Virtual 7.1 surround sound - E900 Pro gaming headset is equipped with a 50mm audio driver, providing powerful and clear bass stereo surround sound. Virtual 7.1 surround sound can better hear the positioning audio and get a more immersive gaming experience.
Detachable Dual Interfaces Design USB and 3.5mm audio interfaces are used. Two removable designs, while compatible with PC devices, also support multiple mobiles. Plug and play, providing more choices and making the scenes of sound more diversified. Note-7.1 surround sound is only available on PC with USB cable 【Note: The microphone without a sponge cover is an upgraded version, it will not affect the use, it is still genuine】
Immersive 7.1 Virtual Surround Sound Create an immersive gaming experience with stereo surround sound in the game. Accurate sound positioning, easy identification of enemy positions, to avoid surprise attack, defeat the enemy to win. Perfect for shooting games like PFS, Destiny 2, Tom Clancy s Ghost Recon, or Fortnite
Great Humanized Design for all-day comfort. with soft memory protein earmuffs on both sides, you won't feel any discomfort while wearing these 7.1 gaming headphones even for a long time gaming. The headband was designed for balanced weight distribution and reduced clamping force to maximize comfort during lengthy gaming sessions
Multi-platform Compatible Virtual 7.1 surround sound gaming headsets works on PS4/ PS4 Pro/ Xbox One S/ Xbox One/ PC/ Mac/ Nintendo Switch/ PSP/ Laptop/ Smartphones and other devices with standard 3.5mm audio jack and USB interfaces. An extra adapter is required for the old-version Xbox controller Nintendo Switch does t support a microphone feature on a gaming headset.
